xml.data:
Home » 39P5 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5) » 1 Kusalattika, Tika » 1.1 Kusalattika, Vedanāttika » 1.1.2 Dukkhāyavedanāyasampayuttapada » 1.1.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Tika
Kusalattika, Vedanāttika
Dukkhāyavedanāyasampayuttapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
5.
12Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
13Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
14Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
6.
15Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
7.
16Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
17Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
18Abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
8.
19Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare…pe…  nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye dve, jhāne magge ekaṃ, sampayutte…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
20(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
